Description.Text:
Property Location
Citadines Apart'hotel Holborn-Covent Garden London is in the heart of London, walking distance from Bloomsbury Square and London School of Economics and Political Science. This 4-star aparthotel is close to King's College London and Trafalgar Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 192 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 21-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby. This Art Deco aparthotel also features a television in the lobby, tour/ticket assistance, and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Citadines Apart'hotel Holborn-Covent Garden London.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Event facilities at this aparthotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of Citadines Apart'hotel Holborn-Covent Garden London.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Citadines Apart'hotel Holborn-Covent Garden London is in the heart of London, walking distance from Bloomsbury Square and London School of Economics and Political Science. This 4-star aparthotel is close to King's College London and Trafalgar Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bloomsbury Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
London School of Economics and Political Science - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Great Ormond Street Hospital - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Opera House - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Theatre Royal Drury Lane - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Russell Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Courts of Justice - Law Courts - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
London Transport Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Covent Garden - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Dickens House - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
King's College London - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Lyceum Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
The British Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
London Temple Church - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Covent Garden Market - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 23.5 km / 14.6 mi

The preferred airport for Citadines Apart'hotel Holborn-Covent Garden London is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
